name: HotLine IBS
description:
Game Jam Go Jam entry.

Game Jam Requirements:
Rhythm - rain falling to beat of music... sort of (we tried!!)
Hacker - Must hack obsticals... umbrellas... out of your way.
Synthwave Music - Ty Maximilian Zantis for permission to use his music for this jam. As well as royalty free Youtube...
Flatulent Sound Effects - Get hit by the rain, and fart. make it to the bathroom to let it all out.

All Sound effects were found across the web, royalty free and free use.
Music was the same or from Maximilian Zantis, check out his soundcloud!
All art and animation was made by us during and for this jam.  

Zook - Background and object art, QA, Team Lead
Katolo - Character Design and Animator
Imperial - Head Programmer, Level Designer
Youthinkasido - Music and sound gatherer
